HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Ritual)
HediffDef.description: Those born under the sign of The Ritual are said to be blessed by Mara. They able to instantly restore their health once per day, and can make insectoids flee in terror.

HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Lover)
HediffDef.description: Those born under the sign of The Lover boast fortified agility, and are able to paralyze a target once per day.

HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Lord)
HediffDef.description: Those born under the sign of The Lord are able to quickly restore health, but are highly susceptible to flame.

HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Mage)
HediffDef.description:
Those born under the sign of The Mage are adept at utilising psycasts, though they are often easily distracted, and tend to be somewhat arrogant.

<color=#E5E54C>Fay</color>
Maximum neural heat limit is increased by 50% of the pawns Intellectual skill.

HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Shadow)
HediffDef.description: Those born under the sign of The Shadow are able to blend into their surroundings once per day.

HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Steed)
HediffDef.description: Those born under the sign of The Steed boast fortified speed.

HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Apprentice)
HediffDef.description:
Those born under the sign of The Apprentice are highly skilled at utilising psycasts. Though this is usually a double-edged sword, as they often have an increased sensitivity to psychic energy.

<color=#E5E54C>Elfborn</color>
Maximum neural heat limit is increased by 150% of the pawns Intellectual skill.
Psychic sensitivity is increased by 50%, this bonus does not increase maximum neural heat.

HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Warrior)
HediffDef.description: Those born under the sign of The Warrior boast fortified attack.

HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Lady)
HediffDef.description: Those born under the sign of The Lady boast fortified personality and endurance.

HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Tower)
HediffDef.description: Those born under the sign of The Tower are able to discover .

HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Atronach)
HediffDef.description:
Those born under the sign of The Atronach are among the most dangerous of psycasters, though they are unable to dissipate neural heat on their own.

<color=#E5E54C>Wormburn</color>
Maximum neural heat limit is increased by 200% of the pawns Intellectual skill.
Reduces neural heat by 50% of damage taken.
Completely unable to dissipate neural heat over time.

HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Thief)
HediffDef.description: Those born under the sign of The Thief boast increased evasiveness.

HediffDef.label: birthsign (The Serpent)
HediffDef.description: Those born under the wandering sign of The Serpent are are able to poison targets, damaging themselves in the process.
